trans-unit.source: Supplies a hash code for an object, using a hashing algorithm that ignores the case of strings.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un codice hash per un oggetto, usando un algoritmo hash che ignora il caso di stringhe.

trans-unit.source: CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider implements the <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> interface supporting case-insensitive comparisons on strings, just as <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface supporting case-insensitive comparisons on strings.
trans-unit.target: CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider implementa il <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider>interfaccia che supporta i confronti tra maiuscole e minuscole nelle stringhe, come <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>implementa il <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>interfaccia che supporta i confronti tra maiuscole e minuscole nelle stringhe.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer> </xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider>

trans-unit.source: The objects used as keys by a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> are required to override the <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method (or the <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> interface) and the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method (or the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface).
trans-unit.target: Gli oggetti utilizzati come chiavi da un <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>necessarie per eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>(metodo) (o <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider>interfaccia) e <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>(metodo) (o <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>interfaccia).</xref:System.Collections.IComparer> </xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> </xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of both methods or interfaces must handle case sensitivity the same way; otherwise, the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> might behave incorrectly.
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione dei metodi o delle interfacce deve gestire distinzione maiuscole/minuscole allo stesso modo; in caso contrario, il <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>comportarsi in modo non corretto.</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: For example, when creating a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>, you must use this class with the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer> class or any case-insensitive <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, quando si crea un <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>, Ã¨ necessario utilizzare questa classe con il <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>classe o una qualsiasi tra maiuscole e minuscole <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>implementazione.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"></xref> class using the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"> </xref> usando il <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> del thread corrente.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider> instance is created using this constructor, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread is saved.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>istanza viene creata utilizzando questo costruttore, il <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>del thread corrente viene salvato.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the saved culture to determine the casing rules; therefore, hash code comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Routine di confronto utilizzate le impostazioni cultura salvate per determinare le regole di maiuscole e minuscole; di conseguenza, i confronti di codice hash potrebbero presentare risultati diversi a seconda delle impostazioni cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su confronti di impostazioni cultura specifiche, vedere il <xref:System.Globalization>dello spazio dei nomi e [globalizzazione e localizzazione](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"></xref> class using the specified <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"> </xref> classe utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the specified <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> to determine the casing rules.
trans-unit.target: Routine di confronto utilizzate specificato <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>per determinare le regole di maiuscole e minuscole.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Hash code comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Confronti di codice hash potrebbero presentare risultati differenti a seconda delle impostazioni cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su confronti di impostazioni cultura specifiche, vedere il <xref:System.Globalization>dello spazio dei nomi e [globalizzazione e localizzazione](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> to use for the new <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> da utilizzare per il nuovo <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: culture is .
trans-unit.target: cultureis .

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"></xref> that is associated with the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread and that is always available.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un'istanza di <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"> </xref> che Ã¨ associato il <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> del thread corrente e che sia sempre disponibile.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider> instance is created using the parameterless constructor, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread is saved.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>istanza viene creata utilizzando il costruttore senza parametri, il <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>del thread corrente viene salvato.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the saved culture to determine the casing rules; therefore, hash code comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Routine di confronto utilizzate le impostazioni cultura salvate per determinare le regole di maiuscole e minuscole; di conseguenza, i confronti di codice hash potrebbero presentare risultati diversi a seconda delle impostazioni cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su confronti di impostazioni cultura specifiche, vedere il <xref:System.Globalization>dello spazio dei nomi e [globalizzazione e localizzazione](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"></xref> that is associated with the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"> </xref> che Ã¨ associato il <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> del thread corrente.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"></xref> that is associated with <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and that is always available.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un'istanza di <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"> </xref> associato <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> e che sia sempre disponibile.

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to determine the casing rules.
trans-unit.target: Routine di confronto utilizzate la <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>per determinare le regole di maiuscole e minuscole.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Hash code comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Confronti di codice hash potrebbero presentare risultati differenti a seconda delle impostazioni cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su confronti di impostazioni cultura specifiche, vedere il <xref:System.Globalization>dello spazio dei nomi e [globalizzazione e localizzazione](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"></xref> that is associated with <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider"> </xref> associato <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for the given object, using a hashing algorithm that ignores the case of strings.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un codice hash per l'oggetto specificato, usando un algoritmo hash che ignora il caso di stringhe.

trans-unit.source: The return value from this method must not be persisted for two reasons.
trans-unit.target: Il valore restituito da questo metodo non deve essere resa persistente per due motivi.

trans-unit.source: First, the hash function of a class might be altered to generate a better distribution, thereby rendering any values from the old hash function useless.
trans-unit.target: In primo luogo, la funzione hash di una classe puÃ² essere modificata per generare una distribuzione migliore, in tal modo il rendering di tutti i valori da funzione hash precedente inutile.

trans-unit.source: Second, the default implementation of this class does not guarantee that the same value will be returned by different instances.
trans-unit.target: In secondo luogo, l'implementazione predefinita di questa classe non garantisce che lo stesso valore verrÃ restituito da istanze diverse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> for which a hash code is to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Object>per cui deve essere restituito un codice hash.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the given object, using a hashing algorithm that ignores the case of strings.
trans-unit.target: Codice hash per l'oggetto specificato, usando un algoritmo hash che ignora il caso di stringhe.

trans-unit.source: obj is .
trans-unit.target: objis .
